name: Jae's Coin Flipper
description:
This is a coin flip tool made for Jae's streams! I know he makes people gamble a lot and I wanted to make this for him as a late debut present

Credits NekoNyaa28 (Niko)Game Designer / Person who made it lolZufiriArtist (Jae's Frost Symbol)AeonixJae's Starting Soon Illustrator (Based on that)
